articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play Australia in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: England to bowl first against Australia

articles.description: Follow live commentary, text & score updates as Fulham host Man Utd plus six other fixtures in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up to Fulham v Man Utd before six other fixtures

articles.description: Watch BBC Two coverage and follow live text updates of the women's rugby league international between England and Wales.
articles.title: Women's international: England v Wales

articles.description: England become the inaugural WXV1 champions with a 33-12 win over world champions New Zealand in Auckland.
articles.title: England beat New Zealand to win first WXV1 title

articles.description: England take timely wickets against Australia to uphold advantage in the first innings during their World Cup match in Ahmedabad, India.
articles.title: England's timely wickets put the brakes on Australia

articles.description: Marcus Rashford's birthday celebrations after Manchester United's 3-0 derby defeat were "unacceptable" and the forward has apologised, says Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: Rashford birthday party 'unacceptable' - Ten Hag

articles.description: Leeds United end Leicester City's nine-game winning run in the Championship with an impressive victory at the King Power Stadium.
articles.title: Leicester winning run ended by impressive Leeds

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen beat Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc to pole position in a rain-affected qualifying session at the Sao Paulo Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen takes pole in rain-affected qualifying

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary as New Zealand play Pakistan in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: Listen: World Cup - New Zealand face Pakistan in crucial game

articles.description: Chelsea boss Emma Hayes says she is "proud" of midfielder Fran Kirby for speaking out on body image issues in women's football.
articles.title: Hayes 'proud' of Kirby for speaking out on body image
